name: Sơn Hỷ Quán

reviews.content: Very good
Ok
Ok
The restaurant probably focuses on VIP rooms so the service outside is not good. The first time the fish was steamed, it was raw and smelled bad and could not be eaten.
The space is very feng shui, has good taste, and the food is also good. Will come back often.

Very impressed with the professional and friendly service style of the staff. The dishes are delicately prepared, rich in flavor and beautifully presented. The restaurant space is luxurious but still creates a feeling of closeness.
The food is delicious, the staff is friendly and quick, the price is reasonable. It is worth coming back with family or friends!
- Enthusiastic and friendly staff.. - Worth staying for family parties & close friends - Beautiful setup worthy of being a top restaurant for friends' parties. …
Warm space, delicious food, good service. Will come back next time. I like the most comfortable parking space.
Take advantage of the opening to receive a free steamed wild boar dish. The gift is also delicious. Enthusiastic staff, spacious restaurant.

name: Beer Đêm Phố Hoà Xuân
intro: Serves dine-in, Has drive-through, Has no-contact delivery
policy: Khách hàng vui lòng liên hệ 84 905 885 308 để biết thêm chi tiết về chính sách của Beer Đêm Phố Hoà Xuân.

reviews.content: Just one visit.  We asked the staff to make the food non-spicy because there were children, but …
Fresh and delicious food, reasonable price, ok to eat with family and friends. There are VIP rooms for large and small parties.
Terrible, from the food to the service. Never coming back.
The food is fine for everyone, for me it's ok. The staff is fine, maybe because I'm a bit easygoing kkk. It's okay to chat with friends. …
Basically, it was a bit bad: - the first order of steamed squid took more than 30 minutes to be served (probably because it took too long to defrost). …
Bad, it took a long time to order food. When we arrived, they brought seafood noodles but we ordered beef noodles. The staff told us to eat it for now. Too bad, don't come here.
fresh food, enthusiastic staff, reasonable price, clean and comfortable air-conditioned rooms
No. 1 seafood restaurant in Hoa Xuan! Fresh seafood, delicious preparation, cold beer, friendly staff, spacious space. Perfect for sipping with friends! 10/10 points! Will come back.

The listed price of the chip chip on the board is 320k, but when I paid, it was 380k. The price is not correct, and it is 5 times more expensive than the actual price. The restaurant should review the price issue and post the price.

The seafood menu is quite rich, the seating is a bit cramped, the wait for food is incredibly long, even when the bill is paid the food still hasn't appeared. The staff can be called "insensitive", whatever you order, whatever you do, it's like "none of my business".

reviews.content: Good price, delicious seafood
Fresh seafood with different recipes, however cigarettes should be banned in this place
Nice seafood
You can drop your kids in the playground when you eat.
Wifi lag =))
Ok
Crab :))))

The first experience was the staff ordering the dishes, I went with 2 people, every time I asked which dishes were sold by the pound, it was a bit annoying. I said 300g for the tiger prawns, the staff said 300g was too little, only about …
Food is served very very slowly. Simple dishes like seafood hotpot, grilled oysters are served after almost an hour. …
Airy space, fresh seafood, cheerful atmosphere, very quick and friendly staff Fresh and delicious food, in general, this place is very ok, There are also private karaoke rooms, you can go in groups

reviews.content: Great price for country style foods. Foods are good. Customer service is nice. It has really nice atmosphere and decoration.
Great price for country style foods. Foods are good too.

Nothing special. Basic service and average food. We have to wait nearly 45 min for Ca Keo Nhuong and that fish was quite mini compared to other restaurants and seems not really fresh. The shrimps we ordered as well.
Good food but waiting for an hour to get it.
local food ...

name: NGON 24H
intro: Serves dine-in, Offers takeout, Offers delivery
policy: Khách hàng vui lòng liên hệ 84 988 181 816 để biết thêm chi tiết về chính sách của NGON 24H.

reviews.content: My friend went to eat and found it delicious so she asked and came to try it The two of us went in the cold rainy season so we thought it was reasonable to eat grilled meat …

The food was terrible, the roasted chicken rice was cold and dry like cold rice left to cool down when customers arrived and then reheated it before serving, the roasted chicken thighs were dry inside like chicken that had been boiled once …
The restaurant is located right at the intersection but the street is not busy, quiet and peaceful, I stopped by for breakfast so I only rate the breakfast dish. …
- Spacious space, decorated according to the season. Currently decorated for Christmas. - Service: The staff works quickly, I probably ate late so there were few …

The quality of the noodles and rolls is good, but the vegetables at this restaurant are so unstable. Many times I bought them and saw that the vegetables were not fresh, but I ignored them. This morning, the vegetables were crushed as if …
Diverse food, stable quality. Enthusiastic staff. Come back many times.
I think the food is quite delicious! The price is also reasonable. The restaurant has a diverse menu so it can satisfy the needs of many different tastes.
Today the quality has gone down. The staff is not enthusiastic anymore. The owner is not at the restaurant so the staff are not welcoming to customers.

The quantity is okay but the quality is sometimes good and sometimes bad. For example: I ate cheese-shaken potatoes but the potatoes were in one place and the cheese was in another and it was lumpy and didn't absorb anything. Overall, it needs to be improved. I haven't tried grilled dishes or hot pot so I can't rate them.

I ate Hanoi bun cha, the restaurant sells delicious food at reasonable prices. Friendly staff. It seems like the restaurant doesn't advertise much, I live nearby but didn't know and accidentally stopped by to eat. It would be better if it opened outside Van Tien Dung.
